channel.title: Comments on: Mini Croquembouche, Belgian Chocolate Mouse Mille Feuille and Pear Bourdaloue (Frangipane Tart) â€“ A Cooking Class at Patisse

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Oh this looks fabulous! So glad to see your post about the class, it looks fantastic! And all your creations look delish!
item.content:encoded: Oh this looks fabulous! So glad to see your post about the class, it looks fantastic! And all your creations look delish!

item.title: By: Emma @CakeMistress
item.dc:creator: Emma @CakeMistress
item.description: Wow, they all look superb! Got excited about the course, then saw in was in Sydney. Rats.
item.content:encoded: Wow, they all look superb! Got excited about the course, then saw in was in Sydney. Rats.

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
These are so elegant and gorgeous ..... the course is definitely worth taking.. do they conduct the class in english too?
Sawadee from bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
These are so elegant and gorgeous ….. the course is definitely worth taking.. do they conduct the class in english too?

Sawadee from bangkok,
Kris

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: What fun, Anita! Your photos are making me drool. Your mini Croquembouche looks divine. Great work!
item.content:encoded: What fun, Anita! Your photos are making me drool. Your mini Croquembouche looks divine. Great work!

item.title: By: Nish
item.dc:creator: Nish
item.description: I stumbled across your website when looking for a croquembouce recipe & it is truly amazing! I'm attempting it next weekend & feeling quite anxious about it. All your food looks delectable!!
item.content:encoded: I stumbled across your website when looking for a croquembouce recipe & it is truly amazing! I’m attempting it next weekend & feeling quite anxious about it. All your food looks delectable!!

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella

item.description: Ahh I didn't realise that they did classes too. How fun! You did a great job Anita! :D

item.title: By: thang @ noodlies

item.description: What a great idea to do a class with friends. I reckon it would be really fun. And the cakes look fantastic, did you make them all on the day?
item.content:encoded: What a great idea to do a class with friends. I reckon it would be really fun. And the cakes look fantastic, did you make them all on the day?

item.title: By: Karen Ng

item.description: The mini croquembouche looks so cute!

item.title: By: Isabella

item.description: Wow, they look amazing, did you make them all? Do they taste as good as they look?!!!!
item.content:encoded:
